metadata.Title: CVE-2010-3691 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PGTStorage/pgt-file.php in phpCAS before 1.1.3, when proxy mode is enabled, allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on an unspecified file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-3691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glpi - 0.80.7-1
No subscription required

moodle - 1.9.9.dfsg2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.80.7-1').
moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.9.dfsg2-5').
